page.title: 13CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Line Tag_ A game played on an area with lines marked on it,e.g.a playground.A person is on and the rest stand in a safe place.The person who is on tries to catch the others as they run around on the lines.If they touch the other person that person is on.The game carries on and on. Marbles_To play you need round balls of glass(marbles).The game is played on a grid with circles in the middle. The object is to get your own and your opponent's marbles into the circles. The person who gets the marbles in the middle keeps them. Hopscotch_To play you need a stone and a grid marked out 1 to 10.The numbers are drawn in a certain order_1 on its own,2&3 above it,4 in the middle above 2&3 and so on.You throw the stone onto the numbers and hop and jump until you get to the stone, miss out, jump back.
